name: New Ch?gaku Eitango Target 1800 DS
description:
New Ch?gaku Eitango Target 1800 DS is an educational English language learning game based on the Eitango Target series of books by Obunsha. These books teach a common common set of English words in order to help students pass English exams. This game, specifically, is based on the Ch?gaku Eitango Target 1800 book, targeted at a middle-school audience, which teaches 1800 common English words.

A variety of different modes are provided to let players study:
  • Training: Players select a group of words, and are then presented audio recordings of words one at a time. Players must first select the correct Japanese translation, then then must write them down in English. This uses the DS's touchscreen and handwriting recognition.
  • Real Test: A more challenging test mode which runs players through a simulated exercise. This is only available after players have gained some mastery in the other modes.
  • My Training: A more customizable training mode. Players can create custom sets of English words, then run through training exercises on only the words in that set.
  • Word Machine: An interactive dictionary of all 1800 words.
  • Record: Shows players' progress through the other modes.
